summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image displays a video game interface focused on the "Equipment" section, specifically highlighting a spirit named "Flint Chief." This spirit is categorized as "Epic" and has a high Qi cost. It offers a "Solid Stance" ability, allowing the player to take the form of a solid black rock to deflect enemy strikes. The equipped effect slightly increases resistance to Four Banes. The interface includes options to equip the spirit, watch a demo, and view other spirits. Player stats such as health, attack, and defense are shown on the right side of the screen.
